q1.question: Is this really free?
q1.answer: Yes! Anonymous users get 3 free itineraries. Sign up for unlimited access, completely free.

q2.question: How accurate are the itineraries?
q2.answer: Our AI is trained on extensive travel data and provides realistic, practical recommendations. However, always verify details before traveling.

q3.question: Can I edit the generated itinerary?
q3.answer: You can regenerate with different parameters. Copy and paste the content to edit manually.

q4.question: Which languages are supported?
q4.answer: Currently English, French, and Arabic with full RTL support.

q5.question: Can I save my itineraries?
q5.answer: Yes! Registered users can save unlimited itineraries to their dashboard.

q6.question: Do you offer refunds?
q6.answer: The service is completely free, so there's nothing to refund!
